author: glasser
msg: FSFS: Cache revision root fs_id's in the svn_fs_t object.
For some large read-only operations against a repository stored in
NFS, I observed a 9% speedup with this patch.
(NUM_RRI_CACHE_ENTRIES): New define for number of cache entries.
(RRI_CACHE_ENTRIES_MASK): New macro "hash function" for RRI cache.
IDs) and rev_root_id_cache_pool (pools for them).  This is a
similar structure to the directory cache already in the struct.
